text: Need Andrew Clark for JB Hi-Fi campaign. Budget around $5,821, looking for 3 x 15-second TikTok, 1 x Press release quote, 2 x Instagram story, 2 x Pinterest pin, 3 x Instagram story. 6 week exclusivity from other electronics brands. Campaign runs October 2025. Usage rights for 7 months. Engagement period: 3 months.
